cards.name: Karn Liberated
cards.text:
[+4]: Target player exiles a card from their hand.
[−3]: Exile target permanent.
[−14]: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Alabaster Mage
cards.text: {1}{W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor:
"We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons."
-Alabaster creed

cards.name: Ancestral Blade
cards.text:
When Ancestral Blade enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Angel of the Dawn
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

cards.name: Archangel of Thune
cards.text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor: Even the wicked have nightmares.

cards.name: Auriok Salvagers
cards.text: {1}{W}: Return target artifact card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Memnarch or the vedalken salvage most of the large machines, leaving us only scraps. Scraps are enough."

foreignPrintings.name: オーリオックの廃品回収者

cards.name: Austere Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

cards.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, indestructible
Other permanents you control have indestructible.
cards.flavor: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

foreignPrintings.name: 希望の天使アヴァシン

cards.name: Blade Splicer
cards.text:
When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control have first strike.
cards.flavor: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."

cards.name: Boon Reflection
cards.text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.
cards.flavor: Twice brewed and twice blessed, the remedy restores both body and mind.

cards.name: Council's Judgment
cards.text: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
cards.flavor: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.

cards.name: Crib Swap
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

cards.name: Crusader of Odric
cards.text: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
cards.flavor: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

cards.name: Ethersworn Canonist
cards.text: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.
cards.flavor: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

foreignPrintings.name: エーテル宣誓会の法学者

cards.name: Fencing Ace
cards.text: Double strike
cards.flavor: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

cards.name: Flickerwisp
cards.text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Its wings disturb more than air.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
-Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

cards.name: Glint-Sleeve Artisan
cards.text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
cards.flavor: "Shine bright, bolts tight."

cards.name: Kemba, Kha Regent
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.
cards.flavor: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

cards.name: Land Tax
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Leonin Abunas
cards.text: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.

cards.name: Master Splicer
cards.text:
When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

cards.name: Myrsmith
cards.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
cards.flavor: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

cards.name: Open the Vaults
cards.text: Return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to the battlefield under their owners' control. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in graveyards.)
cards.flavor: When the vaults are empty, everyone is rich.

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Puresteel Paladin
cards.text:
Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
Metalcraft - Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.

cards.name: Remember the Fallen
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

cards.name: Revoke Existence
cards.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"The time has come for us to throw off the chains of tyrannical gods and antiquated superstitions."
-Tikaia, disciple of Uremides

cards.name: Sanctum Gargoyle
cards.text:
Flying
When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

cards.name: Sanctum Spirit
cards.text:
Lifelink
Discard a historic card: Sanctum Spirit gains indestructible until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
cards.flavor:
"When history becomes too mournful, even good souls may choose to forget."
-Shalai, voice of Plenty

cards.name: Stoneforge Mystic
cards.text:
When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Stonehewer Giant
cards.text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, attach it to a creature you control, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

cards.name: Strength of Arms
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an Equipment, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
cards.flavor:
"We fight not for Avacyn, but for her ideals; not for the church, but for its people."
-Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

cards.name: Tempered Steel
cards.text: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.
cards.flavor:
"Death shall prevail as long as our will falls to rust. May necessity anneal our resolve."
-Ghalma the Shaper

cards.name: Thraben Inspector
cards.text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
cards.flavor: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

cards.name: Topple the Statue
cards.text:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

cards.name: Valor in Akros
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.

cards.name: Valorous Stance
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
cards.flavor:
"Every choice alters the path of fate."
-Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Wrath of God
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Apprentice Wizard
cards.flavor: Aspiring wizards must demonstrate basic levels of willpower and mental discipline to even be considered for an apprenticeship.

cards.name: Arcum Dagsson
cards.text: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."

cards.name: Argivian Restoration
cards.text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."
-Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

foreignPrintings.name: アーギヴィーアの修復術

cards.name: Braids, Conjurer Adept
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

cards.name: Cloudreader Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Corridor Monitor
cards.text: When Corridor Monitor enters the battlefield, untap target artifact or creature you control.
cards.flavor: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.

cards.name: Cyclonic Rift
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
cards.flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

cards.name: Deepglow Skate
cards.text: When Deepglow Skate enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.
cards.flavor: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.

cards.name: Esperzoa
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

cards.name: Faerie Mechanist
cards.text:
Flying
When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

foreignPrintings.name: フェアリーの機械論者

cards.name: Force of Will
cards.text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
cards.flavor: "I alone determine my destiny."

cards.name: Frogify
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)
cards.flavor: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.

cards.name: Grand Architect
cards.text:
Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1.
{U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn.
Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

cards.name: Hinder
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put that card on the top or bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."
-Meloku the Clouded Mirror

cards.name: Inkwell Leviathan
cards.text:
Trample
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains."
-Esper fable

foreignPrintings.name: 墨溜まりのリバイアサン

cards.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
cards.text:
[+2]: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
[0]: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
[−1]: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
[−12]: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

foreignPrintings.name: 精神を刻む者、ジェイス

cards.name: Master of Etherium
cards.text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

cards.name: Master Transmuter
cards.text: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

cards.name: Metallic Rebuke
cards.text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
cards.flavor:
"Too little, too late. The machine is in motion."
-Tezzeret

cards.name: Parasitic Strix
cards.text:
Flying
When Parasitic Strix enters the battlefield, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

cards.name: Phyrexian Metamorph
cards.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

foreignPrintings.name: ファイレクシアの変形者

cards.name: Pongify
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.
cards.flavor: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

cards.name: Relic Runner
cards.text: Relic Runner can't be blocked if you've cast a historic spell this turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
cards.flavor: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

cards.name: Reshape
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"Today's paperweight, tomorrow's leveler."
-Bruenna, Neurok leader

cards.name: Riddlesmith
cards.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

cards.name: Rush of Knowledge
cards.text: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among permanents you control.
cards.flavor:
"Limitless power is glorious until you gain limitless understanding."
-Ixidor, reality sculptor

cards.name: Sentinel of the Pearl Trident
cards.text:
Flash
When Sentinel of the Pearl Trident enters the battlefield, you may exile target historic permanent you control. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

cards.name: Serra Sphinx
cards.text: Flying, vigilance
cards.flavor: Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.

cards.name: Sift
cards.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.

cards.name: Steel Sabotage
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target artifact spell.
• Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work."
-Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

cards.name: Thirst for Knowledge
cards.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
cards.flavor: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

cards.name: Thought Reflection
cards.text: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.
cards.flavor: Only when two oracles speak in unison is an omen accepted as truth.

cards.name: Treasure Mage
cards.text: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Vedalken Infuser
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.
cards.flavor: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

foreignPrintings.name: ヴィダルケンの注入者

cards.name: Well of Ideas
cards.text:
When Well of Ideas enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
At the beginning of each other player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards.

cards.name: Ad Nauseam
cards.text: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value. You may repeat this process any number of times.
cards.flavor: When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work.

cards.name: Beacon of Unrest
cards.text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: "The light of my master's guidance traverses all boundaries, even those separating life and death."

cards.name: Bone Picker
cards.text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.
Flying, deathtouch
cards.flavor: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.

cards.name: Cast Down
cards.text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.
cards.flavor:
"Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."
-Chainer's Torment

cards.name: Costly Plunder
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

cards.name: Dark Confidant
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.
cards.flavor: Greatness, at any cost.

cards.name: Death's Shadow
cards.text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
cards.flavor: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

cards.name: Defiant Salvager
cards.text: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

cards.name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
cards.text: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

foreignPrintings.name: 凶兆艦隊の貯め込み屋

cards.name: Disciple of Bolas
cards.text: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.
cards.flavor: "Lord Bolas has shown me how each miserable little life holds untold resources."

cards.name: Disciple of the Vault
cards.text: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: He stands in the shadow of his lord, Geth, drinking in the dark energies of the Vault.

cards.name: Divest
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.

cards.name: Doomed Necromancer
cards.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Many necromancers share the same last words-the ones that conclude the undeath ritual.

foreignPrintings.name: 宿命のネクロマンサー

cards.name: Dread Return
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback-Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.

cards.name: Driver of the Dead
cards.text: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

cards.name: Drown in Sorrow
cards.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.flavor:
"The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."
-Perisophia the philosopher

cards.name: Executioner's Capsule
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.
cards.flavor: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

cards.name: Fatal Push
cards.text:
Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.
Revolt - Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

cards.name: Geth, Lord of the Vault
cards.text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
{X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with mana value X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player mills X cards.

cards.name: Glaze Fiend
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glaze Fiend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

cards.name: Heartless Pillage
cards.text:
Target opponent discards two cards.
Raid - If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

cards.name: Magus of the Abyss
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

cards.name: Magus of the Will
cards.text: {2}{B}, {T}, Exile Magus of the Will: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.
cards.flavor: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."

cards.name: Morkrut Banshee
cards.text: Morbid - When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage."
-Hildin, priest of Avacyn

foreignPrintings.name: モークラットのバンシー

cards.name: Oubliette
cards.text: When Oubliette enters the battlefield, target creature phases out until Oubliette leaves the battlefield. Tap that creature as it phases in this way. (Auras and Equipment phase out with it. While permanents are phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist.)

cards.name: Ovalchase Daredevil
cards.text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ovalchase Daredevil from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Let me guess. You thought I was dead."

cards.name: Painsmith
cards.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.

cards.name: Ravenous Trap
cards.text:
If an opponent had three or more cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

cards.name: Salvage Titan
cards.text:
You may sacrifice three artifacts rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Exile three artifact cards from your graveyard: Return Salvage Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Silumgar Scavenger
cards.text:
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Silumgar Scavenger. It gains haste until end of turn if it exploited that creature.

foreignPrintings.name: シルムガルの腐肉あさり

cards.name: Skirsdag High Priest
cards.text: Morbid - {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate only if a creature died this turn.
cards.flavor: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."

cards.name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

foreignPrintings.name: 荒廃のドラゴン、スキジリクス

cards.name: Supernatural Stamina
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
cards.flavor:
"All are not equal-neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."

"Here did the Extinguisher steal the light from the world. Here will we sacrifice her to bring the Great Rekindling to our people."
-Illulia of Nighthearth

cards.name: High Market
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: If it can't be had here, it can't be had on any world.

cards.name: Maze of Ith
cards.text: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

cards.name: Mishra's Factory
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
{T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Mystic Gate
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{W/U}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{U}, or {U}{U}.
cards.flavor: The gate of every kithkin doun is a cunning trap, intended to spill visitors into an oubliette from which there is no escape.

cards.name: Rugged Prairie
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W}.
cards.flavor: Hobs bury their kin far from home. They believe the dry, open ground keeps hags from stealing the bones and gwyllions from stealing the spirits.

cards.name: Sunken Ruins
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{U/B}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{B}, or {B}{B}.
cards.flavor: Without the care of the tideshapers, the Lanes lie neglected. Some have flooded entire towns; others dried to cracked mud.

cards.name: Thespian's Stage
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.
cards.flavor: Amid rumors of war, the third act of The Absolution of the Guildpact was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.

cards.name: Twilight Mire
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{B/G}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G}.
cards.flavor: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

cards.name: Urza's Mine
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.
cards.flavor: In his hunger for power and knowledge, Urza dug deep into Dominaria's ancient past.

cards.name: Urza's Power Plant
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.
cards.flavor: Urza threw himself into his research, pushing the boundaries of both possibility and morality.

cards.name: Urza's Tower
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.
cards.flavor: Urza studied the creations of the Thran not simply to learn from them, but to surpass them.

cards.name: Wooded Bastion
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{G/W}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{W}, or {W}{W}.
cards.flavor: The elves of Wilt-Leaf Wood continually expand the palisade surrounding the sanctuary. They hope to one day enclose the entire forest within its walls.

cards.name: Karn Liberated
cards.text:
[+4]: Target player exiles a card from their hand.
[−3]: Exile target permanent.
[−14]: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
cards.text:
[+2]: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
[0]: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
[−1]: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
[−12]: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

foreignPrintings.name: 精神を刻む者、ジェイス

cards.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, indestructible
Other permanents you control have indestructible.
cards.flavor: Avacyn lives on in the hearts and minds of Innistrad's people.

cards.name: Council's Judgment
cards.text: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
cards.flavor: "Our ruling is final."

cards.name: Stoneforge Mystic
cards.text:
When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
"In all my years of research, I have yet to accurately quantify that baffling mental process known as 'inspiration.'"
-Elmora, mage-analyst

cards.name: Cyclonic Rift
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
cards.flavor: "Oh, that's what that switch does!"

cards.name: Force of Will
cards.text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
cards.flavor: "Amateur."

cards.name: Phyrexian Metamorph
cards.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Dark Confidant
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.
cards.flavor: Greatness, at any cost.

cards.name: Fatal Push
cards.text:
Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.
Revolt - Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

cards.name: Thoughtseize
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
cards.flavor: The mind is a fragile thing. Remove the smallest fragment, and the whole thing starts to fall apart.

cards.name: Toxic Deluge
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Armor dissolved into flesh. Flesh melted to bone. Bone fell away to nothing.

cards.name: Blood Moon
cards.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
cards.flavor: Bathed in deep crimson, the land that once gave comfort and shelter now yielded nothing but hostility.

cards.name: Goblin Guide
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.
cards.flavor: When the landmarks themselves get up and move, goblin intuition beats any map.

cards.name: Sneak Attack
cards.text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: "Keep watch? Why? Nothing going to mess with us. We too big and scary."

cards.name: Crop Rotation
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: "The end of my cycle draws near. Rise up, young sprouts, and take root in my place."

cards.name: Doubling Season
cards.text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

cards.name: Exploration
cards.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
cards.flavor: With every step she took, a new world unfolded before her.

cards.name: Noble Hierarch
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.
cards.flavor: In all her years of vigil, her resolve has never faltered.

cards.name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Kaalia of the Vast
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Kaalia of the Vast attacks an opponent, you may put an Angel, Demon, or Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent.
cards.flavor: "I'll have my revenge if I have to call on every force from above and below."

cards.name: Meddling Mage
cards.text:
As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.
cards.flavor: "Some defy the laws of nature. I dare nature to defy me."

cards.name: Batterskull
cards.text:
Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink.
{3}: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand.
Equip {5}

cards.name: Blightsteel Colossus
cards.text:
Trample, infect, indestructible
If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

cards.name: Chrome Mox
cards.text:
Imprint - When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

cards.name: Expedition Map
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"Let's see. I've been here, here, here, here, and here. Where next?"
-Olenn, tireless traveler

cards.name: Lightning Greaves
cards.text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
cards.flavor: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
cards.flavor: At first they thought the vault was empty. Then the walls began to glow.

cards.name: Mox Opal
cards.text: Metalcraft - {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.
cards.flavor: What crossed her mind defied Orthodoxy: could there be perfection beyond compleation?

cards.name: Sword of Body and Mind
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from green and from blue.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and that player mills ten cards.

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from black and from green.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you untap all lands you control.
Equip {2}

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of Fire and Ice deals 2 damage to any target and you draw a card.
Equip {2}

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you gain 3 life and you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Equip {2}

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of War and Peace deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.
Equip {2}

cards.text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.
cards.flavor: The Tolarian Academy was home to some of the greatest discoveries in Dominaria's history-as well as its greatest tragedies.
